original_title: Band on the Run- Paul McCartney and Wings- Paul McCartney Archive Collection DVD
overview: Disc 3 to the 2010 Paul McCartney Archive Collection reissue. This disc contains an audio documentary of the album, originally released in 1999 as Disc 2 of the 25th Anniversary Edition reissue; music videos from the album and a full live concert from the Wings
title: Band on the Run- Paul McCartney and Wings- Paul McCartney Archive Collection DVD
